processing.intro: Personal information is gathered and utilized exclusively for these objectives:

items.access: Enabling access to our technological solutions;
items.relationships: Administering client relationships and user profiles;
items.performance: Evaluating platform performance and enhancing user satisfaction;
items.promotional: Delivering promotional or informational content, with your explicit approval;

items.legitimate: Legitimate business interests, including service quality maintenance and security protection;

crossBorder.content: Given our U.S.-based operations, your information may undergo processing and storage beyond your country's borders. We implement appropriate safeguards to secure your data irrespective of geographic location.

retention.title: 7. Information Retention Period
retention.content: Personal data remains in our possession only for durations required to achieve collection objectives or throughout active business relationships. Certain circumstances may necessitate extended retention to satisfy legal mandates or settle disputes.

security.title: 8. Security Measures
security.measures: We deploy appropriate technical, administrative, and organizational controls to shield your personal information from unauthorized intrusion, data loss, or improper use.

Engagement with these external services remains completely optional and user-directed. {{companyName}} bears no responsibility for external platform privacy approaches and advises consulting their individual policies.

understanding.title: 1. Understanding Cookies
understanding.intro: Cookies represent tiny text files that get saved to your device (including computers, smartphones, and tablets) during website visits. Websites commonly employ them to maintain functionality, improve browsing experiences, and gather analytics or promotional insights.
understanding.types: These files can originate from the site you're currently viewing (first-party cookies) or from external parties (third-party cookies) whose features or services are embedded within the website.

categories.title: 2. Cookie Categories on Our Platform
categories.intro: Our website at {{websiteUrl}} may utilize the following cookie categories:

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.content: Required for core site functionality, these cookies cannot be turned off. They facilitate critical features like secure login, site navigation, and correct page rendering.

performance.title: Performance & Analytics Cookies
performance.content: These gather anonymized metrics that reveal user engagement patterns on our platform. Examples include which pages attract visitors, how long sessions last, and visitor drop-off points.

functional.title: Functional & Preference Cookies
functional.content: These retain your customized settings and choices, including language selection, regional preferences, and interface layout, to provide a personalized experience on return visits.

advertising.title: Advertising & Targeting Cookies (when applicable)
advertising.content: These monitor your browsing patterns across multiple sites to deliver advertising tailored to your interests. Implementation requires your explicit consent.

thirdParty.title: 3. External Service Cookies
thirdParty.intro: Our platform integrates third-party services that may install cookies on your device. Such services encompass:

items.ai: Artificial intelligence integrations and conversational agents;
items.social: Social network widgets and monitoring tools.

thirdParty.note: Since these cookies fall outside our direct control, we encourage you to consult the privacy and cookie documentation provided by these external vendors.

controlling.title: 4. Controlling Your Cookie Settings
controlling.intro: You maintain complete control over cookie preferences through your browser configuration. Access detailed guidance for popular browsers below:
controlling.warning: Be aware that blocking specific cookies could impact website functionality and overall user experience.

modifications.title: 5. Policy Modifications
modifications.content: {{companyName}} retains the authority to modify this Cookie Policy as circumstances require. Material revisions will be reflected on this page.

contact.content: For inquiries regarding this Cookie Policy or our cookie implementation, please contact us at:

dataDeletion.title: User Data Deletion Policy
dataDeletion.intro: {{companyName}} prioritizes your privacy and empowers you with complete control over your personal information. This policy details the process for requesting deletion of data gathered through our Facebook or Instagram application integrations.

whatWeCollect.title: 1. Information We Collect
whatWeCollect.intro: Through your authorized Meta login, our application may gather the following information when you connect via Facebook or Instagram:

items.profile: Publicly available profile details (display name, avatar image, etc.)
items.userId: Unique user identifier from Facebook or Instagram
items.additional: Additional information you've specifically authorized via Facebook Login permissions

items.access: Grant you access to our platform's functionality
items.contact: Reach out to you when you've provided consent

requesting.title: 3. Requesting Data Removal
requesting.intro: Should you choose to remove your information from our platform, you have two convenient options:

items.step2: Select Apps and Websites from the menu.
items.step3: Locate our application in your connected apps.
items.step4: Remove the application to automatically initiate data deletion.

optionB.title: Option B: Email Request
optionB.send: Send your deletion request directly to:

items.subject: Subject line: User Data Deletion Request
items.name: Your complete name
items.userId: Your Facebook/Instagram User ID (alternatively, provide a screenshot showing your app profile)

optionB.processing: Your request will be handled within 7 business days, and you'll receive email confirmation once the deletion is complete.

retention.title: 4. Data Retention Timeline
retention.content: Your information is stored only as long as needed to serve the purposes described in this policy or to meet legal obligations. Upon deletion, your personal information is permanently erased from our infrastructure.

contact.title: 5. Get in Touch
contact.content: For questions or concerns regarding this Data Deletion Policy or our data handling practices, reach out to us:

updates.title: 6. Updates to This Policy
updates.content: This policy may be revised to accommodate legal or operational changes. Updates will appear on this page with a new "Effective Date" noted at the top.
